metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1921 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in avidemux element in gst_avi_demux_invert function which allows a heap overwrite while parsing avi files. Potential for arbitrary code execution through heap overwrite.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
